patthana21.45:1.1_0: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.45:1.1_1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci naviññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.45:1.1_2: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho ca
patthana21.45:1.1_3: kenaci naviññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana21.45:2.1_0: Nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva.
patthana21.45:3.1_0: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva.
patthana21.45:4.1_0: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighassa purimasadisaṁ navapañhaṁ kātabbaṁ.
patthana21.45:5.1_0: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
